alert.note: Alert for Hickman; Maury (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 01 at 1:09PM CST until January 01 at 1:30PM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN MAURY...NORTHWESTERN WILLIAMSON AND NORTHERN HICKMAN COUNTIES... At 108 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles southwest of Fairview, or 11 miles northeast of Centerville, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Centerville, Santa Fe, Primm Springs, Lyles and Nunnelly. This includes Interstate 840 between mile markers 6 and 17. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for Middle Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
